dynTf.py

1 #!/usr/bin/python3
2 import rospy
3 import sys
4 import tf
5 import tf2_ros
6 import geometry_msgs.msg
7 import math
8 if __name__ == '__main__':
9  rospy.init_node('my_static_tf2_broadcaster')
10  broadcaster = tf2_ros.StaticTransformBroadcaster()
11  static_transformStamped = geometry_msgs.msg.TransformStamped()
12 
13  tfBuffer = tf2_ros.Buffer()
14  listener = tf2_ros.TransformListener(tfBuffer)
15  rate = rospy.Rate(20)
16  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
17  try:
18  trans = tfBuffer.lookup_transform(
19  'marker_id3', 'usb_cam', rospy.Time())
20  break
21  except (tf2_ros.LookupException, tf2_ros.ConnectivityException, tf2_ros.ExtrapolationException):
22  rate.sleep()
23  continue
24  static_transformStamped.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
25  static_transformStamped.header.frame_id = "world"
26  static_transformStamped.child_frame_id = "usb_cam"
27  static_transformStamped.transform.translation.x = trans.transform.translation.x - 0.1
28  static_transformStamped.transform.translation.y = trans.transform.translation.y - 0.3
29  static_transformStamped.transform.translation.z = trans.transform.translation.z + 0.1
30  static_transformStamped.transform.rotation.x = 1
31  static_transformStamped.transform.rotation.y = 0
32  static_transformStamped.transform.rotation.z = 0
33  static_transformStamped.transform.rotation.w = 0
34  broadcaster.sendTransform(static_transformStamped)
35  rospy.spin()
